post.title: New Toy
post.content:
I came back from lunch yesterday to discover that my boss had left a new toy on my desk – a Smartphone Developer Kit. Not sure where he got it, since it’s all sold out. I’m stoked because I’ve been wanting a Smartphone for a while, but I want to use T-Mobile’s service and I didn’t want to pay a premium for an unlocked device. Now, I don’t have to.

Any suggestions on cool Smartphone software?

comments.name: mearls@hotmail.com (Michael Earls)
comments.content: I’m starting to work with Home Automation and I think it would be sweet to have an app to turn off the oven from my phone when I’m on vacation and start getting paranoid about it.

comments.name: Chris Kinsman
comments.content: Good luck with the phone. Mine only lasted a few months. It was severely gravity challenged and RedE doesn’t make the most durable phones out there…
